channel.title: Flavonol on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Flavonol on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaYABBY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaYABBY5 Gene Name: YABBY family transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional regulation of flavonoid biosynthesis in Artemisia annua by AaYABBY5.

item.title: CaMYB39
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaMYB39 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-SG7 transcription factor Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB-SG7 transcription factor CaMYB39 orchestrates surface phenylpropanoid metabolism and pathogen resistance in chickpea.

item.title: CsbZIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsbZIP1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP1-CsMYB12 mediates the production of bitter-tasting flavonols in tea plants (Camellia sinensis) through a coordinated activator-repressor network.

item.title: CsGT45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGT45 Gene Name: flavonoid glucosyltransferase Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Using degenerate primers designed to match the plant secondary product glucosyltransferase (PSPG) box we cloned a full length cDNA encoding CsGT45 from C.

item.title: CsMYB12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB12 Gene Name: MYB12 protein Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP1-CsMYB12 mediates the production of bitter-tasting flavonols in tea plants (Camellia sinensis) through a coordinated activator-repressor network.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.title: CtCHI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CtCHI1 Gene Name: chalcone isomerase1 Genome: Species: Carthamus tinctorius Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of CtCHS1 Increases Accumulation of Quinochalcone in Safflower.

item.title: DTX35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana03g002183 Gene Symbol: DTX35 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The CabHLH1-DTX35/DFR module regulates pollen fertility by promoting flavonoid biosynthesis in Capsicum annuum L.

item.title: FabHLH3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FabHLH3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaMYB123 interacts with FabHLH3 to regulate the late steps of anthocyanin and flavonol biosynthesis during ripening.

item.title: FaMYB123
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_5g32460 Gene Symbol: FaMYB123 Gene Name: R2R3 MYB transcription factor 123 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaMYB123 interacts with FabHLH3 to regulate the late steps of anthocyanin and flavonol biosynthesis during ripening.

item.title: NtMATE21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE21 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion21 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.title: NtMATE22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE22 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion22 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.title: PbMYB10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB10b Gene Name: MYB10b transcription factor Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Among these MYB-like genes, the specific functions of two novel MYB TFs, designated as PbMYB10b and PbMYB9, were further verified by both overexpression and RNAi transient assays.

item.title: PbMYB9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbMYB9 Gene Name: MYB9 transcription factor Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Among these MYB-like genes, the specific functions of two novel MYB TFs, designated as PbMYB10b and PbMYB9, were further verified by both overexpression and RNAi transient assays.

item.title: ZmSIZ1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb355110 Gene Symbol: ZmSIZ1a|phd17 Gene Name: PHD-transcription factor 17 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ZmSIZ1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb265410 Gene Symbol: ZmSIZ1b|phd12 Gene Name: PHD-transcription factor 12 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
